Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1000 CONSOL ENERGY DRIVE,SUITE 100, CNX CENTER SUITE 101, CANONSBURG, Pennsylvania, 15317-6506, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: CONSOL Energy Inc is a producer and exporter of high-BTU bituminous thermal coal. It owns and operates longwall mining operations in the nation and export terminals on the Eastern seaboard. The principal activity involves mining, preparation, and marketing of thermal coal, sold to power generators. Its operating segment includes PAMC (Pennsylvania Mining Complex); CONSOL Marine Terminal and Other. The company generates maximum revenue from the PAMC segment.
